verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> a thing <WH1697> was revealed <WH1540> <WH8738> unto Daniel <WH1840>, whose name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> <WH8738> Belteshazzar <WH1095>; and the thing <WH1697> was true <WH571>, but the time appointed <WH6635> was long <WH1419>: and he understood <WH995> <WH8804> the thing <WH1697>, and had understanding <WH998> of the vision <WH4758>.
In those days <WH3117> I Daniel <WH1840> was mourning <WH56> <WH8693> three <WH7969> full <WH3117> weeks <WH7620>.

I ate <WH398> <WH8804> no pleasant <WH2532> bread <WH3899>, neither came <WH935> <WH8804> flesh <WH1320> nor wine <WH3196> in my mouth <WH6310>, neither did I anoint <WH5480> <WH8804> myself at all <WH5480> <WH8800>, till three <WH7969> whole <WH3117> weeks <WH7620> were fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8800>.
And in the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, as I was by the side <WH3027> of the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, which is Hiddekel <WH2313>;

Then I lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and behold a certain <WH259> man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> in linen <WH906>, whose loins <WH4975> were girded <WH2296> <WH8803> with fine gold <WH3800> of Uphaz <WH210>:

His body <WH1472> also was like the beryl <WH8658>, and his face <WH6440> as the appearance <WH4758> of lightning <WH1300>, and his eyes <WH5869> as Menorahs <WH3940> of fire <WH784>, and his arms <WH2220> and his feet <WH4772> like in colour <WH5869> to polished <WH7044> brass <WH5178>, and the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697> like the voice <WH6963> of a multitude <WH1995>.

And I Daniel <WH1840> alone saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the vision <WH4759>: for the men <WH582> that were with me saw <WH7200> <WH8804> not the vision <WH4759>; but <WH61> a great <WH1419> quaking <WH2731> fell <WH5307> <WH8804> upon them, so that they fled <WH1272> <WH8799> to hide <WH2244> <WH8736> themselves.

Therefore I was left alone <WH7604> <WH8738>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> this great <WH1419> vision <WH4759>, and there remained <WH7604> <WH8738> no strength <WH3581> in me: for my comeliness <WH1935> was turned <WH2015> <WH8738> in me into corruption <WH4889>, and I retained <WH6113> <WH8804> no strength <WH3581>.

Yet heard <WH8085> <WH8799> I the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697>: and when I heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697>, then was I in a deep sleep <WH7290> <WH8737> on my face <WH6440>, and my face <WH6440> toward the ground <WH776>.
And, behold, an hand <WH3027> touched <WH5060> <WH8804> me, which set <WH5128> <WH8686> me upon my knees <WH1290> and upon the palms <WH3709> of my hands <WH3027>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, O Daniel <WH1840>, a man <WH376> greatly beloved <WH2532>, understand <WH995> <WH8685> the words <WH1697> that I speak <WH1696> <WH8802> unto thee, and stand <WH5975> <WH8798> upright <WH5977>: for unto thee am I now sent <WH7971> <WH8795>. And when he had spoken <WH1696> <WH8763> this word <WH1697> unto me, I stood <WH5975> <WH8804> trembling <WH7460> <WH8688>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he unto me, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, Daniel <WH1840>: for from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> that thou didst set <WH5414> <WH8804> thine heart <WH3820> to understand <WH995> <WH8687>, and to chasten <WH6031> <WH8692> thyself before <WH6440> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, thy words <WH1697> were heard <WH8085> <WH8738>, and I am come <WH935> <WH8804> for thy words <WH1697>.

But the prince <WH8269> of the kingdom <WH4438> of Persia <WH6539> withstood <WH5975> <WH8802> me one <WH259> and twenty <WH6242> days <WH3117>: but, lo, Mikha'el <WH4317>, one <WH259> of the chief <WH7223> princes <WH8269>, came <WH935> <WH8804> to help <WH5826> <WH8800> me; and I remained <WH3498> <WH8738> there with <WH681> the kings <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539>.

Now I am come <WH935> <WH8804> to make thee understand <WH995> <WH8687> what shall befall <WH7136> <WH8799> thy people <WH5971> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>: for yet the vision <WH2377> is for many days <WH3117>.
And when he had spoken <WH1696> <WH8763> such words <WH1697> unto me, I set <WH5414> <WH8804> my face <WH6440> toward the ground <WH776>, and I became dumb <WH481> <WH8738>.

And, behold, one like the similitude <WH1823> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> touched <WH5060> <WH8802> my lips <WH8193>: then I opened <WH6605> <WH8799> my mouth <WH6310>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him that stood <WH5975> <WH8802> before me, O my lord <WH113>, by the vision <WH4759> my sorrows <WH6735> are turned <WH2015> <WH8738> upon me, and I have retained <WH6113> <WH8804> no strength <WH3581>.

For how <WH1963> can <WH3201> <WH8799> the servant <WH5650> of this my lord <WH113> talk <WH1696> <WH8763> with this my lord <WH113>? for as for me, straightway <WH6258> there remained <WH5975> <WH8799> no strength <WH3581> in me, neither is there breath <WH5397> left <WH7604> <WH8738> in me.
Then there came again <WH3254> <WH8686> and touched <WH5060> <WH8799> me one like the appearance <WH4758> of a man <WH120>, and he strengthened <WH2388> <WH8762> me,

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, O man <WH376> greatly beloved <WH2532>, fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: peace <WH7965> be unto thee, be strong <WH2388> <WH8798>, yea, be strong <WH2388> <WH8798>. And when he had spoken <WH1696> <WH8763> unto me, I was strengthened <WH2388> <WH8694>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let my lord <WH113> speak <WH1696> <WH8762>; for thou hast strengthened <WH2388> <WH8765> me.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he, Knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> thou wherefore I come <WH935> <WH8804> unto thee? and now will I return <WH7725> <WH8799> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with the prince <WH8269> of Persia <WH6539>: and when I am gone forth <WH3318> <WH8802>, lo, the prince <WH8269> of Grecia <WH3120> shall come <WH935> <WH8804>.

But <WH61> I will shew <WH5046> <WH8686> thee that which is noted <WH7559> <WH8803> in the scripture <WH3791> of truth <WH571>: and there is none <WH259> that holdeth <WH2388> <WH8693> with me in these things, but Mikha'el <WH4317> your prince <WH8269>.
